creator: Theshirtshop.in
descriptionHtml:
Sell your deadstock on one click is the USP of our platform. Shirt Shop is India’s first subscription based B2B Ecommerce platform designed specifically for garment retailers & manufacturers in India. We try to bring retailer & manufacturers on a platform where they can buy & sell in a safe and trust worthy environment. Also to address the most primitive problem of deadstock for the retailer.

This Is How It Works:

- Find the products among wide range of Apparels & Garment category
- Place order and we guarantee the secure transaction and payment safety.
- Trade efficiently, with our flexibility to directly connect to the seller.
- Buy &Sell: Get orders from all across India.
- Sell your dead stock on one click just by buying a small subscription.

FIND:

No need to go out and spend money on business buying tour. Just find the latest product from a wide range of garment categories from thousands of listed sellers across India.

Place Order:

Just choose your products and buy them through the platform. Rest is our responsibility. We guarantee a secure transaction and safety of your payment until you receive and inspect your order. We will get your order deliver safely and timely with our large network of trusted logistic partners. Delivers to 26000 + Pin codes across India.

Trade Efficiently:

Our flexibility for the seller to contact buyer and vice versa is handy in case you have some special order request. We have an inbuilt tool which enables to & fro approval mechanism which ensures the trust between buyer and seller.

Buy & Sell:

Our large network of sellers and buyers across India open the doors to different markets across length & width of India. So now the market which you think are farthest and distinct for you are now accessible to you on just a click. So start selling & buying because whole India is a one big market.

Sell your Deadstock:

Shirt shop is India’s first subscription based B2B Platform, which means as a buyer you can buy a small subscription and get rid of your long shelved unmoved inventory on one click. Become a TSS prime member and sell your deadstock without even stepping out from your shop. Get money directly to your bank account. Rest is our responsibility.

Service:

Get the ease of doing business because we are servicing entire India.

“To Ab Business ChalegaNahi….Badhega”
descriptionShort: India's First B2B Subscription eCommerce platform For Garment Retailers
title: The shirt shop : B2B buying for Fashion Retailers
